I lost it, and requested to be banned. After I was finally banned, it was actually hard. Every other server sucked. I tried creating my own, and I failed. To be honest, it's been awhile. We all make mistakes. I am actually sorry for how I behaved, and how I overreacted. Other then my own server, I couldn't find anywhere else on GMod.

I really ask for a unban, and I am sincerely sorry. Please, forgive me.

Thank you if you forgive me, if not, well, was nice to see this place again.. nice redesign by the way!
Well, this thread is old but, you're not banned sooo.
